description: This file defines a configuration class for application settings using Pydantic models. It specifies environment variables for app info, database, security, CORS, messaging, real-time features, and protocol-specific defaults, with a method to parse CORS origins into a list and a function to instantiate settings.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: Pydantic model holding application configuration, loaded from environment variables with defaults and descriptions, including properties for parsed CORS origins.

methods.name: List[str] cors_origins_list(self)
methods.description: Returns CORS origins as a list of strings, splitting the environment variable on commas.

methods.name: Settings get_settings()
methods.description: Function to instantiate and return the Settings object loaded with environment variables.

ctags.name: APP_NAME
ctags.pattern: /^    APP_NAME: str = Field(default="Device Remote Management API", description="Application name"/

ctags.name: APP_VERSION
ctags.pattern: /^    APP_VERSION: str = Field(default="0.1.0", description="Application version")$/

ctags.name: CELERY_BROKER_URL
ctags.pattern: /^    CELERY_BROKER_URL: str = Field(default="redis:\/\/localhost:6379\/0", description="Celery br/

ctags.name: CELERY_RESULT_BACKEND
ctags.pattern: /^    CELERY_RESULT_BACKEND: str = Field(default="redis:\/\/localhost:6379\/1", description="Celer/

ctags.name: CORS_ORIGINS
ctags.pattern: /^    CORS_ORIGINS: str = Field(default="", description="Comma-separated list of allowed CORS orig/

ctags.name: DATABASE_URL
ctags.pattern: /^    DATABASE_URL: AnyUrl = Field(..., description="SQLAlchemy async URL (e.g. postgresql+asyncpg/

ctags.name: ENABLE_SSE
ctags.pattern: /^    ENABLE_SSE: bool = Field(default=True, description="Enable SSE job progress endpoint")$/

ctags.name: JWT_ALGORITHM
ctags.pattern: /^    JWT_ALGORITHM: str = Field(default="HS256", description="JWT signing algorithm")$/

ctags.name: JWT_EXPIRES_IN
ctags.pattern: /^    JWT_EXPIRES_IN: int = Field(default=3600, description="JWT expiry in seconds")$/

ctags.name: JWT_SECRET
ctags.pattern: /^    JWT_SECRET: str = Field(..., description="Secret used to sign JWT tokens")$/

ctags.name: SNMP_DEFAULT_PORT
ctags.pattern: /^    SNMP_DEFAULT_PORT: int = Field(default=161, description="Default SNMP port")$/

ctags.name: SNMP_DEFAULT_RETRIES
ctags.pattern: /^    SNMP_DEFAULT_RETRIES: int = Field(default=3, description="Default SNMP retry count")$/

ctags.name: SNMP_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
ctags.pattern: /^    SNMP_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT: float = Field(default=5.0, description="Default SNMP timeout in second/

ctags.name: SNMP_MAX_REPETITIONS
ctags.pattern: /^    SNMP_MAX_REPETITIONS: int = Field(default=25, description="Default BULKWALK max repetitions"/

ctags.name: Settings
ctags.pattern: /^class Settings(BaseSettings):$/

ctags.name: model_config
ctags.pattern: /^    model_config = SettingsConfigDict(env_file=".env", env_file_encoding="utf-8", case_sensitive/
